title: Why the Daybreaker SMP should return
body: The Daybreaker SMP was the highlight of Daybreaker's online career in content creation and as such should return so his full glory might oncemore dominate the internet

title: Looking to start a war
body: Me and my friends recently got full netherite and we want to test our skill in mortal combat. Plus the server's been kinda boring lately soooo

title: Staff Applications
body: Now accepting mod applications until July 4th. See attached link below for more details!

title: Migrating to a newer version?
body: How would the Daybreaker SMP do if it migrated to the latest snapshot of Minecraft? I'm curious to see so I decided to run the experiment myself on a server I hosted myself

title: Trailer
body: I made a fan trailer for the Daybreaker SMP and I think it would cool if you guys got to see it
